sentences.sentence: But ascorbic acid has another major benefit: healthier skin.
sentences.translation: 但是抗坏血酸还有另一个主要的功效：改善皮肤。

sentences.sentence: Vitamin c, which is also known as ascorbic acid, is one of the most powerful anti-oxidants.
sentences.translation: 维他命c，也叫抗坏血酸，就是最好的抗氧化剂之一。

sentences.sentence: Vitamin C, also called ascorbic acid, is an antioxidant that promotes healthy teeth and gums.
sentences.translation: 维他命C，也叫抗坏血酸，是一种抗氧化剂，可以促进牙齿和牙龈的健康。
